drupalNodeEvent.title: CULTURE, COVID, CONTROVERSY: TOKYO 2021 & BEIJING 2022 An Olympic Symposium

field_description.processed: Please join the students of 21M.848 (Performance Studies: Advanced Theories of Sport) for two panels of their individual presentations and group Q&A, along with our special guest Dr. Susan Brownell, who will deliver a talk about the connections between the Olympics, NGOs, and human rights.
